Name: infantile Refsum disease
Definition: A peroxisomal disease that is characterized by neurological impairment

Name: mevalonic aciduria
Definition: A peroxisomal disease that is characterized by cortical atrophy

Name: peroxisomal acyl-CoA oxidase deficiency
Definition: A peroxisomal disease that is characterized by hypotonia and seizures in the neonatal period and neurological regression in early infancy.

Name: alpha-methylacyl-CoA racemase deficiency
Definition: A peroxisomal disease that is characterized by retinitis pigmentosa resulting in progressive visual failure

Name: peroxisomal biogenesis disorder
Definition: A peroxisomal biogenesis disorder that has_material_basis_in defects in PEX genes.

Name: obsolete Zellweger spectrum disorder
Definition: A peroxisomal biogenesis disorder that has_material_basis_in defects in PEX genes.

Name: acatalasia
Definition: A syndrome that is characterized by abnormal calcification of the epiphyses
